title: DDFP 578: '17 Texans w/ Braxton Miller & Best CB Duos w/ Chris Harris Jr.
itunes:title: DDFP 578: '17 Texans w/ Braxton Miller & Best CB Duos w/ Chris Harris Jr.
description:
Dave Dameshek is first joined by Matt "Money" Smith and Texans wide receiver Braxton Miller to discuss his versatility as a player, his relationship with coach Bill O'Brien and his experience learning the offense as a rookie. Then, Shek is joined by Cynthia Frelund and Broncos CB Chris Harris Jr. to talk about the best defenses of this century, the best CB duos and his excitement for the new season of Game of Thrones. Plus, Cynthia does a special Chris Harris Jr. edition of "Cynthesize It!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
